scripts.build-es2021: git remote remove origin && git remote add origin "git@github.com:$TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG.git" && git fetch --quiet origin && git checkout --quiet es2021 && mkdir "out/2021" && cp -R img "out/2021" && ecmarkup --verbose spec/index.html out/2021/index.html --css out/2021/ecmarkup.css --js out/2021/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build-master: mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --lint-spec --verbose spec/index.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build-ci: npm run build-master && npm run build-es2021
scripts.prebuild-only: npm run clean && mkdir out && cp -R img out
